plot: Maggie, a divorcee with 2 daughters and an ex-step-son is nervous about a river rafting trip with her new boyfriend. To avoid spoilers.. Maggie finds herself alone but pursued by ruthless gang. She has to survive the Texan river and heat. The ex-step-son gets worried and set out from California to find her.   Written by  Rob Hartill
title: River of Rage: The Taking of Maggie Keene
